SEARCH
Package plateau

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
plateau.Cell
Direct Known Subclasses:
Room, Street
public abstract class Cell extends Object
An abstract class representing a cell on the game board

    • display

      public void display(int n)
      Displays a part of the cell based on the given parameter.
      Parameters:
      n - The parameter indicating which part of the cell to display: - If n equals 0, it displays the top part of the cell (border). - If n equals 1, it displays the left part of the cell. - If n is other than 0 or 1, it displays the remaining part of the left side.
